## DATE\_TIME\_PICKER\_CONFIGURATION variable

Injection token used for obtaining datetime picker configuration

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
DATE_TIME_PICKER_CONFIGURATION: InjectionToken<DateTimePickerOptions<any>>
```
